page.title: 16Villages north of Bedford
page.content: The two most important villages north of Brickhill and Putnoe are Ravensden and Renhold.Both villages consist of many old houses with old age pensioners as owners.They are very quiet villages with many farms around them.There are a small number of new roads with new houses.Many of the houses,old and new,are very large.Sometimes there are five or six bedrooms. many of the farms are separated by trees-a rare occurence these days in this region.Many horses and ponies are kept on the farms even though the land may be owned by farmers and the horses and ponies by house owners.
